Check it out… place your bid now.

From August 3, 2020 to August 7, 2020, all school sites (including Freedom Elementary, Mary Ann Sanders Elementary, Ustach Middle School) will be serving meals from 9:00 am- 11:00 am.

Beginning August 10, 2020, all school sites will be serving meals from 11:00 am- 1:00 pm.

All meals will continue to be served at no cost to all children under 18 for the month of August only.

This program continues solely for the pickup of meals and meals will not be consumed on site. We encourage families to continue to be proactive in reducing the risk of COVID-19 by not congregating at the school site once meals have been distributed, continue to wash your hands often, sneeze or cough into a tissue and stay home if you are sick.

Please feel free to contact our Nutrition Services Office at (209)574-5607 if you have any questions.

Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), children who are eligible for free or reduced-price meals at school will get extra food benefits. These food benefits are called Pandemic EBT or P-EBT benefits. P-EBT benefits help families in California buy food when schools are closed because of the coronavirus emergency.

Families will get up to $365 per eligible child on their P-EBT card to use on food and groceries.

Families with children who get CalFresh, Medi-Cal or Foster Care benefits do not need to apply. Most will get their P-EBT card in the mail during the month of May. P-EBT cards will begin arriving around May 12, 2020.

Families with children who are eligible for free or reduced-price meals and who do not get their P-EBT card in the mail by about May 22, 2020, must apply online before June 30, 2020. The online application will be available beginning May 22, 2020, at ca.p-ebt.org.

Please refer to this chart to find out if you automatically qualify or if you need to apply for the P-EBT card.

Information and application forms are also available on the Modesto City Schools Website under the department of Child Welfare and Attendance.

As a reminder, the deadline to apply is Thursday, February 28th. After the February 28th deadline, applications will no longer be accepted.
